videopoker.InvalidGameStateException

  • Packages that use InvalidGameStateException 
    Package Description
    videopoker
    package to define how to play any kind of video poker.
    videopokerdebug
    package to implement a debug mode of playing Video Poker

    • Uses of InvalidGameStateException in videopoker

      Methods in videopoker that throw InvalidGameStateException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] VideoPoker.advice()
      this method gets the indexes of the cards that are advised to hold and returns them.
      void VideoPoker.bet(int bet)
      With this method, you can place a bet on VideoPoker, with a given credit.
      java.lang.String VideoPoker.deal()
      this method gets the first five cards from the deck and returns them in the shape of a string
      PlayResult VideoPoker.hold(int[] indexes)
      This method changes the cards on the indexes given in the parameter indexes with the cards on the top of the deck
      void VideoPoker.quit()
